title: Department and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S. I. No. 351 of 2020)) hereby
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the National Transport Authority
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the National Transport Authority 

(Extension of Remit) (Fares Scheme) Order 2022. 

(2) This Order comes into operation on 01 August 2022.
text_norm: 1 (1) order may cited national transport authority (extension remit) (fares scheme) order 2022 (2) order come operation 01 august 2022

title: Department and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S. I. No. 351 of 2020)) hereby
heading: 2. The functions assigned to the National Transport Authority under
text_raw:
2. The functions assigned to the National Transport Authority under 
section 59 of the Dublin Transport Authority Act 2008 (No. 15 of 2008) are 
extended to apply generally to all areas in the State outside the Greater Dublin 
Area. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

15 July, 2022. 

EAMON RYAN, 

Minister for Transport. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 22nd July, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [368] 3

title: Department and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S. I. No. 351 of 2020)) hereby
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation) 

This Order extends the remit of the functions assigned to the National 
Transport Authority under section 59 of the Dublin Transport Authority Act 
2008 (No. 15 of 2008) to apply generally to all areas in the State outside the 
Greater Dublin Area. The Order comes into operation on 01 August 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [368]
